title: The Noblest Tale feat. Lisa Loeb
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Grammy Award-winning singer-songwriter Lisa Loeb (A Simple Trick to Happiness, Feel What U Feel) discovers the true meaning of goodness, virtue and honor in this folktale originally from Mexico.
